Looks great and that is about it. crappy random storyline and only gives use more questions. that the next movie has to explain somehow to please the audience. Or they are just as stupid as with the last jedi and create another thousand questions. The problem with this movie is that its called starwars. remove it and its oke.

The huge middle finger to the 'old fans ' the crappy plots and killing snoke off in the most stupid death ever so kylo becomes the supreme commander\, a little boy that doesnt even know why he killed his father. Luke being portrait as a person that has given up to life itself (and almost murdered a pupil because he was scared). This is the same person that faced darth vader and palpatine without fear. And i have many more things but i just cant remember it because the storyline was just so boring to watch. oh yeah luke dies a pointless death to give the resistance a group of like 20 people a little spark of hope.

I couldnt help but see some symbolic stuff in this movie. like Luke milking the cow. remembers me that this movie is indeed only made to make cash. Also on the last planet the whole planet is covered with salt. maybe just enough salt for all the wounds it made to all the older fans.
